book.synopsis: This story reflects the trends and attitudes that were popular at the time, but its theme are eternal and universal. As in all romance fiction, the plot revolves around star-crossed lovers. There are moments of passion, anguish, and tenderness-all integral facets of falling in love.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.75 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
